[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Floral displays” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”Contact Us” button_one_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOCJ9fQ==@” button_two_text=”Get A Quote” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.61)” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_one_url” _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Party-Decor-Hire-flower-arrangement.png” parallax=”on” background_blend=”overlay” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” content_font_size=”20px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Whether you prefer silver or glass, conservative or contemporary, large or small, elaborate or simple, we’re here to exceed your expectations with our flower arranging skills. We work within your budget, color theme, and flower preferences to deliver arrangements that delight you. From bouquets to boutonnieres, centrepieces to arch arrangements, and even flower decor for chairs or napkins, we handle it all with expertise and precision. Choose us, and you’ll be thrilled with the results.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][lwp_image_carousel gallery_ids=”407,405,404,403,401,400,387,397″ show_dots=”off” show_arrows=”off” autoplay_animation=”on” pause_on_hover=”off” infinite_animation=”on” vertical_layout=”off” adaptive_height=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/lwp_image_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
